item.description:
Monica Trust - Organizer 978-877-1119

 

This will be my fifth time running this race. It's one of my favorite 5K's. It takes place in Hollis, NH.

This is a fantastic event for runners of all ages. Starting on Main Street in the center of Hollis and weaving through Monument Square onto Depot Road, this USATF certified race course is all downhill. The drop in elevation of 224 feet from start to finish gives runners an advantage to run their fastest 5K.

To register click on the link below.

http://hollisfast5k.com/

 

The Hollis Brookline Rotary Club will host the sixth running of the Hollis Fast 5K – and it keeps getting faster and faster – on Thursday, June 10, 2010. Start time for the race is 6:30 pm. Race day check-in and the awards ceremony will take place at Alpine Grove Banquet Facilities in Hollis on Rte 111A. Runners must arrive early to allow time for busing from Alpine Grove to Hollis Middle School.

 

If you have any questions, feel free to email or call.
item.name: Hollis Fast 5K
